QuestData.Title: Trial of the Naaru: Tenacity
QuestData.Description: Four trials you must pass before you are deemed worthy by the naaru.$B$BIn our travels we have encountered many dangerous beings. Some of these beings we incarcerated and placed in what is now known as the Arcatraz of Tempest Keep.$B$BThere is one prisoner, however, that is a victim of circumstance. A stowaway who was in the wrong naaru vessel at the wrong time.$B$BVenture to the Arcatraz and rescue the gnome, Millhouse Manastorm. Ensure his survival.
QuestData.LogDescription: A'dal in Shattrath City wants you to rescue Millhouse Manastorm from the Arcatraz of Tempest Keep.$B$BThis quest must be completed in Heroic dungeon difficulty.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to A'dal at Lower City in Shattrath City.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $N. You have passed the trial of tenacity.
